data.message: I'm signing in via FB as it says I created an account back in 2013. I tried to sign in another way but got the error message that I have to sign in via FB. Then I got to where they ask me to 'Connect this session with your existing account', I click on it and the page doesn't connect - I can't put my code in. My husband got the bottle saying Punta Cana especially as we don't know when we can afford to go back there.

replies.message: Hi Lucy, we're sorry to hear this. Could you give us a call on 0800 22 77 11 (option 1), Monday - Friday, 9am - 6pm, so we can help you troubleshoot. Thanks
